textInChatBox: Happy Birthday, many more years of life and blah blah blah
text2: This is what I was about to do...
text4: Because I wanted to do something...
wishText:
Wishing us both a day filled with joy, love, and countless blessings! May God continue to guide our paths and bring us happiness, health, and success in the year ahead. Itâ€™s always special to share this day with someone as amazing as you!

outroText: Anyway, enjoy this very special day. May God bless you abundantly, and I also want you to know that you have a brother in Christ here who you can always count on! Always!
replayText:
Be strong and courageous; do not be afraid or dismayed, for the Lord your God is with you wherever you go!
 Joshua 1:9
